name: xzg-multi-tool
description: A static web app for flashing TI CC2538 / CC1352 / CC2652 and SL EFR32 using the Web Serial API or bridge.

scripts.build: npm run clean && esbuild src/flasher.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/flasher.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 && npm run copy:static && npm run inject:commit && npm run fav:gen && npm run fav:inject && npm run copy:ready
scripts.build:lite: npm run clean && esbuild src/flasher.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/flasher.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 && npm run copy:static
scripts.copy:static: copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html src/style.css src/index.js dist && copyfiles -u 1 imgs/**/* dist/imgs
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FLASHER,STATIC,FAV,SERVER "esbuild src/flasher.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/flasher.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --watch" "nodemon -q --watch src --ext html,css,js --exec \"npm run copy:static && npm run fav:inject\"" "nodemon -q --watch favicon/favicon-settings.json --ext json --exec \"npm run fav:gen && npm run fav:inject\"" "npm:preview"
scripts.fav:gen: realfavicon generate favicon/logo.svg favicon/favicon-settings.json favicon/favicon-data.json dist/fav

author: xyzroe
